backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing baby-themed animation features and associated frontend file mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend project files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables, dark theme tokens, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup with protected routes and admin seeding on load.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass-style card component with optional hover animations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that shows the Navbar when a session exists and renders page content.
frontend/src/components/motion/AnimatedR: Simple wrapper adding a fade-in animation to routed content.
frontend/src/components/motion/BabyComed: Renders baby-themed login animations using static image assets and CSS motion classes.
frontend/src/components/nav/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Telus dropdown, route links, admin link, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/PremiumCard.tsx: Premium glass card with icon, title, and hover elevation effects.
frontend/src/components/routing/AdminRou: Guards admin-only routes by checking session role and redirecting non-admins.
frontend/src/components/routing/Protecte: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Displays status indicators (pending, approved, rejected) with themed colors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and custom utility classes including animations and a luxury dark theme.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays a user approval dashboard where admins can view, approve, or reject pending users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a personalized home screen with welcome text and premium feature cards for logged-in users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login form with animations and handles authentication via the login utility.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Embeds an external portfolio site inside a styled animated container.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Provides a registration form that submits new users for admin approval and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Renders a videos page displaying YouTube embeds in animated GlassCard components using a predefined videos array.
frontend/src/utils/auth.ts: Provides localStorageâ€‘based registration, login, logout, and admin approval/rejection logic for users.
frontend/src/utils/motion.ts: Defines shared motion duration and CSS animation class name constants for consistent UI animations.
frontend/src/utils/seed.ts: Seeds a default approved admin user into localStorage if one does not exist.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Wraps localStorage access for users and session data with typed helper functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, typography, and extended theming options.
project_state.json: Stores overall project metadata, architecture notes, features, and image requirements.
